author.bio: Web application security and accessibility evangelist. Software instructor. Conference lecturer and presenter.

wordpressPost.title: Vulnerable WordPress Plugins Report for the Weeks of December 21, 2018 through January 4, 2019
wordpressPost.excerpt: Vulnerable Plugins Six disclosures over the last two weeks, with three issues unfixed. View this week's vulnerable plugins list. Luckily, the unfixed vulnerabilities are all in plugins that are fairly...
wordpressPost.content:
Vulnerable Plugins

Six disclosures over the last two weeks, with three issues unfixed.

View this week’s vulnerable plugins list.

Luckily, the unfixed vulnerabilities are all in plugins that are fairly old with small installation numbers.
